items.title: US launches strikes against Islamic State in Nigeria
items.description: President Donald Trump has previously accused the Nigerian government of failing to protect Christians from jihadist groups.

items.title: Zelensky hails 'new ideas' on peace after talks with US envoys
items.description: Ukraine's leader gives an upbeat assessment after discussing the plan with Steve Witkoff and Jared Kushner.

items.title: US judge blocks detention of British social media campaigner
items.description: Imran Ahmed was among five people accused of seeking to "coerce" US firms into censoring free speech.

items.title: Should a top Russian archaeologist face trial for digging in occupied Crimea?
items.description: The case of a scholar wanted in Ukraine sparked a debate on the relationship between museums and the Russian state.

items.title: India's solar boom faces a hidden waste problem
items.description: A recent study has found that India will generate over 11 million tonnes of solar waste by 2047 if it does not scale up recycling.
